forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress of 'rothich woods'

comments.text: first section is completed asside from trees and the river water. second area needs trees and foliage. background needs lots of work.
back trees replaced with non-textured ones that fit in better. log hut now has a sofa (but no fatass to sit on it).
'first' log cabin mostly furnished. planning on getting most of the map done next week.
'last' trees added, figuring out how i can add a canopy without it just being 500+ circles.
trying to think of how to minimise lag a bit more but wont return to the map in a while.
best solution, rebuild area using much less shapes for ground, trees are mostly fine. will do this when other areas are 'finished'.

thread.latestCommentText: best solution, rebuild area using much less shapes for ground, trees are mostly fine. will do this when other areas are 'finished'.
